thread.title: Man Lives With 7 Human-Size Sex Dolls | Men’s Health
thread.title_full: Man Lives With 7 Human-Size Sex Dolls | Men’s Health

title: Man Lives With 7 Human-Size Sex Dolls | Men’s Health
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
But then you learn there’s a second wrinkle to this story and you feel a little less good. Turns out Li has an 18-year-old son, Yang Yang, whom he has encouraged to use the dolls for satisfying his biological needs. On Yang’s 18 th birthday, Li gifted him one of the dolls so he “could put her to good use when he needs.” This is a bit creepy because Li previously said he treats his dolls like family members, and we don’t have to tell you the implications of bringing his son into the mix. 
But then you learn there’s a third wrinkle to this story, and now you’re not sure how to feel. Because Li, above all else, is just a father with his son’s best interests at heart. Li told The Daily Mail that, “I want him to use the doll instead of catching random diseases from outside by accident. When I give him sex education, I taught him the importance of staying safe when it comes to sex.” Seems pretty practical. 
These are just the facts. Do with them what you will. Maybe the video below, from a Chinese website called Pear, will provide some additional clarity. But it is in Chinese, so maybe not.
